summary.Title: Sushikok
summary.Presentation: Our Sushi Restaurant in Amager is looking for Full-time (37-40h)  and Part-time (20-30h) Sushi cook, Sushi man and Sushi assistant. Your main tasks:- Preparation of ingredients and m

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Our Sushi Restaurant in Amager is looking for Full-time (37-40h)  and Part-time (20-30h) Sushi cook, Sushi man and Sushi assistant.
 
Your main tasks:
- Preparation of ingredients and materials (rice, vegetables) for sushi production;
- Production of different Sushi maki rolls and Nigiri;
- Responsible for food hygiene and quality-control;
-Maintaining a clean work environment in order to prevent food contamination;

Your profile:
- You must have European residence/work permit in order work in Denmark;
- Ability to work in a fast paced work environment;
- You love to work in a team;
- Sense of responsibility.
 
For anyone who is also interested in Sushi or Asian cuisine but does not have related work experience, you can also apply for the Sushi assistant position, related training will be provided before working on board.
 

We are looking for the candidates that can start A.S.A.P.  If you are interested in this position, please send your application and resume to: kontakt@sushi-joint.dk or Mobile: +45-2236 0511 (Victoria).

- You love to work in a team;

For anyone who is also interested in Sushi or Asian cuisine but does not have related work experience, you can also apply for the Sushi assistant position, related training will be provided before working on board.
